What is the step-by-step process for assembling an IKEA BILLY bookshelf while incorporating safety measures and sequential problem-solving? Please use the following [XML data] format for the instructions:
<assembly>
  <step>
    <description>Start by identifying all necessary parts, including 6 shelves, 4 long screws, 12 dowels, 8 metal pegs, 8 metal peg covers, and 1 allen key.</description>
    <image>image1.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Put on protective eyewear and gloves before beginning assembly.</description>
    <image>image2.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Insert dowels into the holes on the side panels.</description>
    <image>image3.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Attach the top panel to the side panels using the long screws and allen key.</description>
    <image>image4.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Repeat step 3 and 4 for the middle panel and bottom panel.</description>
    <image>image5.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Attach the back panel to the bookshelf using the metal pegs and covers.</description>
    <image>image6.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Your bookshelf is now assembled! Remember to dispose of all packaging materials properly.</description>
    <image>image7.jpg</image>
  </step>
</assembly>

```xml
<assembly>
  <step>
    <description>Start by identifying all necessary parts, including 6 shelves, 4 long screws, 12 dowels, 8 metal pegs, 8 metal peg covers, and 1 allen key.</description>
    <image>image1.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Put on protective eyewear and gloves before beginning assembly to ensure safety from any sharp edges or splinters.</description>
    <image>image2.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Lay out all parts on a flat surface to ensure nothing is missing and check the instruction manual for any special notes.</description>
    <image>image8.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Insert dowels into the pre-drilled holes on the side panels, ensuring they are fully seated to avoid misalignment.</description>
    <image>image3.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Attach the top panel to the side panels using the long screws and allen key, ensuring the screws are tightened evenly to prevent warping.</description>
    <image>image4.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Repeat step 3 and 4 for the middle panel and bottom panel, checking alignment after each panel is attached.</description>
    <image>image5.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Attach the back panel to the bookshelf using the metal pegs and covers, ensuring the back panel is flush for stability.</description>
    <image>image6.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Install the shelves at your desired heights using the remaining metal pegs, making sure each shelf is level.</description>
    <image>image9.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Secure the bookshelf to the wall using provided wall brackets for added safety, especially if you have children or pets.</description>
    <image>image10.jpg</image>
  </step>
  <step>
    <description>Your bookshelf is now assembled! Remember to dispose of all packaging materials properly and recycle where possible.</description>
    <image>image7.jpg</image>
  </step>
</assembly>
```
